useCase.name: Booking and Payment
useCase.description: Allows the customer to select a football pitch, choose a time slot, make a booking, and proceed with payment.

successEndConditions.condition: The football pitch is successfully booked and paid for.

mainSequence.step: Select a time slot for booking.
Send the selected time slot to the system.
Check availability of the selected time slot.
Allow booking of the football pitch.
Confirm successful booking of the football pitch.
